name: QuizGame
0:
”Alexa, ask quiz game and quiz me”
”Alexa, ask quiz game to start a quiz”
”Alexa, ask quiz game and start a quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quiz game
des: Mathinator allows users to initiate math quiz games. After installing the skill, you can ask for quizzes of varying levels, which then test addition, multiplication, division, and subtraction. The games are set for a pre-determined amount of time, and high scores are recorded over time to allow players to keep track of their highest scores for the day. Points are rewarded based on quickness to respond and accuracy, rewarding fast answers with more points.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
